All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Gen_RPS_Game
This class represents each game played within the whole match.
Main
Here is my Final Project for CSC 222-1H0F SP23 at Laurel Ridge Community College Generalized RPS Game (Note: RPS stands for "Rock, Paper, Scissors") Version 1.0 - "Presentation Mode": The version presented in front of fellow students on the last day of CSC 222-1H0F SP23 in Spring of 2023 at Laurel Ridge Community College on Monday, 8 May 2023 starting at 5PM.
Main_Menu
This is a static class that is never instantiated.
My_Quit_Exception
This custom exception type is unnecessary, but I wanted to include a custom exception type in my program as practice.
NPC
This is the class for Player objects controlled by the computer.
PC
This is the class for Player objects controlled by the user(s).
Player
This is the base (and abstract) class from which the PC and NPC classes are derived.
Throw_interface
This functionality could be done more simply as a method within the abstract base Player class, but I want experience using Interfaces on this project.
